availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Daniel W. Johns (Louisa, Lawrence county, farmer and representative)

body.p: Louisa, Lawrence County, Kentucky, farmer and representative. Kentucky native. Married to Ann Johns. Father of Isabela Johns, Clayton Johns, Daniel W. Johns, William H. Johns, E. E. Johns. Farmer in Lawrence County in 1860. Representative from Louisa, Lawrence County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Kentucky Digital Newspaper Program, "The Daily Commonwealth, 1863-01-30." https://kentuckynewspapers.org/catalog/xt7n8p5v7w3d (accessed December 07, 2018)
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lawrence County, p.29.
Find A Grave, "Daniel W. Johns (December 21, 1815-January 18, 1898)," Memorial #93605124, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/93605124 (accessed December 07, 2018).
